name: The North Face Never Stop Wearing Jumpsuit - Women's
description:
Soft and oh-so stretchy, this lightweight jumpsuit is easy option to help you reduce decision fatigue right at the start of your day.Recycled polyester, spandex blend packs down small and resists wrinkles.PFC-free DWR protects the material and keeps your jumpsuit cleaner longer.Stealthy hand pockets.Elasticated waistband and drawcord combo for a personalized fit.Elasticated cuffs.Standard fit feels just right.

        Sustainability
